data.text:
The hotel deserves an excellent rating due to the amazing location, superb cleaning staff who always have a wide smile,  brilliant chinese restaraunt onsite,  reception  staff are always very helpful/courteous upholding marriot  standards to the fullest with local emirati hospitality,  nothing is too much to ask.  I was extended early check in which was very kind, as i was recovering from a flu and need a room asap.   I wouldn't hesitate booking this hotel at all if you want the best experience in diera area at reasonable prices.    

Just one small minor suggestion, access to communal microwave would be amazing to heat up food brought from our relatives or outside.
data.title: Simply the best for the area at reasonable rates

user_location.name: Dar es Salaam, Dar Es Salaam Region

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Shamik,

Thank you for sharing your experience at Aloft Dubai Creek.

The team of Aloft Dubai Creek is delighted to know that you had a wonderful stay with us and we were able to provide you with great service. Well noted your comments and shared them with the team.

Sincere regards,

Zee Bassila
Hotel Manager
owner_response.author: Aloft Dubai City Centre Deira

data.text:
Aloft has been our extended home.
We always love our staycation here.
Shout out to their best employee Sherouk, she's one of the reasons why we always want to go come back.
She is helpful, accommodating and always has the best smile.
She is the Hotel's best asset.
Thank you Sherouk!
data.title: Amazing as always!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Janice,

Thank you for your perfect rating and superb review.

The team of Aloft Dubai Creek is delighted to know that you had an unforgettable stay with us. Your sweet comments have been shared with the team, especially with Naveed. This serves as an inspiration for us to continue giving excellent service to our valued guests.

We hope you had a great time in Dubai and we wish to welcome you again.

Sincere regards,

Zee Bassila
Hotel Manager
owner_response.author: Aloft Dubai City Centre Deira

data.text:
Hi
We stayed in Aloft 2nd time, we always love staying in Aloft in Room service staff really helpful, her name Evangeline is a real help and cleaning our room. We really enjoyed our stay. We will recommend our family and friends to stay here
 Location is nice and metro is nearby

data.text: I like the hotel a lot! Our room was very nice and clean (everyday), we were very comfortable with the beds and those fluffy pillows. The view was amazing and the sun that came inside in the morning was perfect to wake us up. The breakfast was decent, it could be better. The dinner was amazing thought !!! Every person was polite happy and respectful. But actually the one I LOVED the most was NAVEED! He was so helpful, polite and respectful he helped us by calling us a taxi EVERY SINGLE DAY! We became close friends and he thought us many life lessons that were very touchingly! Lastly me, my family and my friend had so much fun in the playing room, especially the pool table! I would surely come again and suggest it to you!
data.title: My experience in ALOFT DUBAI CREEK
